summary: HCSM News ~ Ottawa hopes Ontario will make 'informed decision' on overdose prevention sites
title: HCSM News ~ Ottawa hopes Ontario will make 'informed decision' on overdose prevention sites
body:
Canada’s health minister is offering to share the federal government’s research on overdose prevention and supervised consumption sites with Ontario as the province weighs whether to allow such facilities to continue operating.



Read more from CBC https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/toronto/overdose-prevention-sites-ottawa-1.4812529?cmp=rss

summary: HCSM News ~ Federal lawyer asks B.C. judge to toss experts' reports on medical marijuana
title: HCSM News ~ Federal lawyer asks B.C. judge to toss experts' reports on medical marijuana
body:
A lawyer for the federal government is asking the court to reject the reports of three doctors and a criminologist she says are either unqualified or biased in favour of medical marijuana dispensaries fighting to stay open in Vancouver.



Read more from CBC https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/british-columbia/federal-lawyer-asks-b-c-judge-to-toss-experts-reports-on-medical-marijuana-1.4812218?cmp=rss

summary: Why Do You Get Sick After Your Vacation?
title: Why Do You Get Sick After Your Vacation?
body:
Why Do You Get Sick After Your Vacation?

Reasons why you get sick after your trip

For one, we often tend to abandon our usual habits while away.  Probably we get less sleep, consume more alcohol and over-indulge in new foods —  less healthy or balanced.

Pair that with the truth that airline terminals, buses, trains, as well as resorts are overflowing with bacteria.

Once home, get back to your normal routines as quickly as possible.…

View On WordPress

summary: Fish oil supplement in pregnancy improves child’s muscle and bone development
title: Fish oil supplement in pregnancy improves child’s muscle and bone development
description: Children whose mothers take fish oil supplements during pregnancy have more muscle and stronger bones in early childhood, a new trial has found. Research from the University of Copenhagen has found that women who took the omega-3 fatty acid pills daily from halfway through their pregnancy had children with a higher BMI by age six. X-ray scans revealed these children weren’t simply carrying more unhealthy fat as they also had more lean muscle, and higher bone density than the children whose mothers took an olive oil placebo pill instead. via Snapzu : Health & Body

X-ray scans revealed these children weren’t simply carrying more unhealthy fat as they also had more lean muscle, and higher bone density than the children whose mothers took an olive oil placebo pill instead. via Snapzu : Health & Body

summary: Switched to Vegetarian Food since August, then discovered I lost weight and muscles via /r/Fitness
title: Switched to Vegetarian Food since August, then discovered I lost weight and muscles via /r/Fitness
body:
I’m 22M, 75kg - I’ve been working out already for more than 2 years.

​

Since January, I upgraded my workout session with more exercises, sets and focus on improving my body. I’m typically working out 2 muscles per sessions (back + biceps e.g) with 4 exercises x 4 sets + ABS in the end. I’ve seen big improvements on the weight and body since doing that (before was 3x3), which made me really happy and more confident on continuing to do the same. I was eating 4-5 times a day, 150-200g of chicken a day, plus tons of vegetables, fruits, cereals and one protein shake after each workout session.

​

Since August, me and my SO decided to switch for vegetarian food and cut on the meat intake. We wanted to do this for a period of time as a test and before that I researched multiple resources of people working with with vegetarian food and they had amazing results. Yesterday I saw that I lost some of the muscles in the upper body and lost some weight. Since switching to vegetarian I continued to eat 4-5-6 times a day (as before) with lots of protein from cereals, vegetables, peanuts, same protein shake after each workout session. I thought it would be enough to compensate on the lack of protein from meat.

​

Now, I’m not sure what I want to do. Tbh I’d love to keep the vegetarian food in my diet, and don’t really want to get back to eating meat, but in the same time I want to have results in the gym and keep my body growing.

​

Some of the options I was thinking was

- improve my diet with more protein, carbs and calories

- start the day with protein shake + one more protein shake after each workout

- keep the same diet but lower my workout session to 3 exercises x 3 sets so I burn less calories

What do you think?

​

Reddit, I’d love and appreciate any suggestions and advice. Thanks!



Submitted September 06, 2018 at 01:10AM by k0mpas
via reddit https://ift.tt/2oHUEMF

summary: 12 Patterns That Go Along with A Healthy and Balanced Body
title: 12 Patterns That Go Along with A Healthy and Balanced Body
body:
So for today our team’ve formulated a summary of TWELVE terrific guidelines (you won’t always need to adhere to each one of these) that are likely to allow you reach or take care of a healthy body. These tips vary from practical day-to-day activities, to minding external elements like your psychological durability so as to perform to your greatest extent.

Have breakfast

Among one of the best vital suggestions we can possibly list is for people to get a healthy well-balanced early meal featuring a part of fruit, a lot of fibers (breadstuff, grain, oats and such) and also water or perhaps a shake. It is really very essential to initiate your metabolism processes up in the early morning and grant you that energy breakthrough in order to get you all set for the daytime.

Plan your meals

In the same manner to maintaining a journal when it comes down to organizing your training sessions so as to keep bolstering your effectiveness, your mealtimes need to be considered around that. When you are seeking to build your muscle mass, select lean meat whereas you ’d be consuming pasta’s for you to nourish a more triathlon appearance.

Water

Despite the fact that our physical bodies exist from 60%, even the smallest percent fewer will result in you longing for it. So with that stated, it is very important that you get sufficient water in to meet these demands, particularly before, during as well as after training when you are predisposed to drop the most through perspiration.

Small exercise breaks

Given that we are all earning a living we will have to value those small breathers we have the opportunity to take (lunch) and make them into greater than they are by never just relaxing on your bum and eating. Alternatively utilize the moment granted efficiently by means of doing small workouts before eating. Go up a flight of steps 5 times and after that eat to really feel you’ve deserved the food you’ve been waiting on OR stir up a sweat and thereupon the mood for food, which you failed to have earlier.

Go offline

Being emotionally steady and self-assured will attribute a great deal to your end results of the workout session. As social media is a substantial (for most at least) variable to your every day life’s journey, it may be a good tip to “Go offline” by putting your cell phone down an hour or two prior to your workout to get to a serene state and be totally concentrated on the workout you are intending to carry out.

Doing new things

Apart from a range in the activities you are carrying out, they could end up being a pain and because of that, try training anew by doing/trying out various sorts of activity that exercise the very same muscle groups. Think about recreations like kayaking, climbing, boxing and such.

Quit bad habits

May seem easier to say than stop carry out, yet it ought to stated still. Addictions like smoking, severe alcohol consumption, junk food stops belong to those.

Sleep well

An additional routine of achieving/maintaining a healthy and balanced body is assuring you have adequate rest. Exercising on only 3 to 4 hrs of shuteye will definitely take you out fast. Pursue approximately 6-8 hrs and perform to the greatest extent.

Work out regularly

A large component of sustaining a healthy system and among our greatest tips is to work out routinely. As soon as you don’t you may be overdoing your training session quickly as you do not have a genuine measurement device apart from your emotion (not always the greatest measurement tool, feeling). Avoid pain of your muscular tissues over the long-term by completing routine workouts and follow your programs.

Head outdoors

Training at the health club is great and all, still, walk out and get a bit of sunshine (Vitamin D) every so often. It avoids your physical workouts from coming to be dull and a drag and will show you much more regarding your immediate surrounding (hiking).

Keep your balance.

When you have an end goal in mind, generally men and women go directly for it to guarantee its reached asap. Shaping your system and wellness usually requires a little bit of time. Don’t ever exaggerate it and see to it you work out consistently to get a balanced outcome.

Mentally stable.

Get lots of rest. Meditation, yoga and basic strolls are a wonderful series of physical exercises that assist tremendously in keeping you think straight. A full week full of workout sessions can quickly emerge as demanding, combine this with a taxing career and your mug will overflow. Integrate a yoga program of a several hours into your weekly activity and maintain your cool and achieve/maintain the body you wish.
